options.answer: To protect against power outages and ensure continuous power supply

questions.question: What is the difference between software and hardware in a computer system?

options.answer: Software refers to physical components, while hardware refers to programs and data.
Software and hardware are synonymous and interchangeable terms.
Software consists of tangible components, while hardware consists of intangible programs.
Software refers to programs and applications, while hardware refers to physical components.
